snippet: TISHMAN--John. The Board and Staff of NRDC mourn the passing of John L. Tishman, the beloved father of our esteemed chairman, Daniel R. Tishman. A University of Michigan graduate who served in the United States Navy, John was a father of the modern American construction industry. He supervised the construction of some of the world's most iconic skyscrapers, including the John Hancock Center in Chicago, IL and the twin towers of the World Trade Center in New York. Tishman Realty and Construction Company was in the vanguard of the sustainable design movement, and the New School named its Tishman Environment and Design Center in honor of his achievements. We extend our deepest sympathies to Dan, his wife Sheryl, sons Josh and Gabe, and Dan's sister, Katherine Blacklock and her son Kyle. Rhea Suh, President NRDC; John H. Adams, Trustee & Founding Director; Frances Beinecke, former President 1/3
lead_paragraph: TISHMAN--John. The Board and Staff of NRDC mourn the passing of John L. Tishman, the beloved father of our esteemed chairman, Daniel R. Tishman. A University of Michigan graduate who served in the United States Navy, John was a father of the modern American construction industry. He supervised the construction of some of the world's most iconic skyscrapers, including the John Hancock Center in Chicago, IL and the twin towers of the World Trade Center in New York. Tishman Realty and Construction Company was in the vanguard of the sustainable design movement, and the New School named its Tishman Environment and Design Center in honor of his achievements. We extend our deepest sympathies to Dan, his wife Sheryl, sons Josh and Gabe, and Dan's sister, Katherine Blacklock and her son Kyle. Rhea Suh, President NRDC; John H. Adams, Trustee & Founding Director; Frances Beinecke, former President 1/3
